column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove a MAZDA CX-9 too fast
column5: and then crashed into a canal
column6: causing shock at 10:30 pm on Saturday. June 28
column11: the Mazda-CX9 ‘2AT-2123’ plunged into the sewerage canal
column12: causing damage to the left side of the car. The driver got out of the car and there were no injuries.------The driver called a crane
column13: which came and pulled out the car. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
